answers.answer: When were you last checked for diabetes?

About 6 months ago, Supposed to be border line. Pre diabetic. Doctor says, some doctors might not consider my condition pre diabetic, but he does. I am not on any medication though, he suggested that I shoudl work on weight control by diet and excercise and see if it could be controlled before going on meds
I have sore throat now, its dry and feels rough and inflamed
Aren't you the guy that did something in China or something?
You lost 15lbs in 3 weeks. Are you just not eating or something?

question: I am back, I guess looking for support. 3 weeks since exposureI know I am low risk, but here are my nagging symptoms1) Weight loss - about 15 pounds - in 3 weeks2) Diarrhea - on and off for 15 days - Strangely I have normal stools for a day or two and Diarrhea kicks in for a day - normal again3) Body cramps - on and off - I have had these type of cramps for over 4 years, so I am not concerned about these - other things at play - possible diabetis4) Abdominal pain due to diarrhea5) woke up this morning in a cold sweat
title: concerned
